website_summaries.verdict: Buyers love the color, flavor, and aroma of this affordable oil.
pros: 16.9 ounces, packaged in a tin bottle
Good for cooking, hair and skin
cons: Some find the taste and odor to be unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have In Your Beauty Routine
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a five star product for anyone looking for a carrier oil or even to use alone. It's a deep green color, which is so fascinating being that many oils high in omega-3 are stripped of its natural color. This avocado oil is non-greasy and absorbs AMAZING. I loved it so much! I wore a teeny bit under my makeup primer and I was complimented so much at work for the beauty of my skin. The exterior of the bottle was damaged..it was dented in pretty badly; however, it didn't puncture the interior at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer is wonky...very wonky
customer_reviews.text: I love this avocado oil and have bought their cans of avo oil and spray before. The spray cans spray mechanism is horrible. Dont know what they changed but itll either spray a thin weak stream of oil or a huge gush of spray sending herbs, food all over the place. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Oil, High Smoke Point; Great for Skincare
customer_reviews.text: One of the highest quality cooking oils, avocado oil is low in cholesterol and has a high smoking point to minimize polymerization at culinary temperatures. In a salad, the flavor is (what else?) 'nutty' and a bit 'sweet.' Acidity is lower than in olive oil. If you are going to use fresh avocado pears in a salad, why not pair them with the same oil? It works for me...but olive oil adds a complexity so, mostly, I choose that. LA TOURANGELLE is a fine purveyor of vegetable oils and I have a renewing supply of my favorites. At some level of cooking, quality oils are like spices: specific ones stand out with specific ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: James EllsworthTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: This has a very strong odor and taste, I ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a very strong odor and taste, I am used to a more mild avocado oil. YUCK. I will be on the hunt for something that is less overpowering when I make my eggs.
customer_reviews.author: H  C M

customer_reviews.title: Avocado Oil
customer_reviews.text: I opened this product and it smelt a bit off. I had purchased this brand in the store once that is why I bought it online hoping to set up a subscription for it; however, it did not smell right and had an off taste to it as well. So had to order a different brand and most likely will not be getting this one again.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Mccullough

customer_reviews.title: rancid taste
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how this oil got such good reviews. I've used a few different brands and this one is awful! Unless, you like the taste of overripe avocados. It is obvious this oil is made with rotten/overripe avocados. You know that weird, something is off, taste they get when they are too ripe? That's what the oil tastes and smells like, rancid!!
customer_reviews.author: etropsis

customer_reviews.title: Very dark oil
customer_reviews.text: This batch of avocado oil is VERY DARK, and I am used to light colored avocado oil. I contacted the manufacturer in CA, and they responded quickly and thoroughly, explaining that there is natural variation in color depending on several factors and that this run of the production simply appears dark with no impact on quality. I have been using it for a month or so and it tastes fine and cooks well. In the photo, the can I bought is on the left, avocado oil from that can is in my clear dispenser in the center, and -- for comparison -- some olive oil (from a different manufacturer) is in the clear dispenser on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural 4C hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my scalp massager and my hair feels so moisturized and healthy! Also, my grays have gone from dull to shiny. I will keep this in my arsenal as part of my regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Shemiyah Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like rancid olive oil. Smelled nothing like avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Day

customer_reviews.title: not a nice green color
customer_reviews.text: The can was dented and the color of the oil was brown, not a nice green color. The previous purchases always had a nice light green color even though the cans are always dented. i would not buy again because I might get another bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Smells very bad!
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase this oil again and do not recommend it to others. Honestly, I really wanted to like this product and bought this particular avocado oil because of the numerous good reviews. But when I opened the container the contents were shockingly pungent, with a smell similar to paint or turpentine. I am so disappointed! Although this is my first time buying food grade avocado oil, nowhere have I read that it's supposed to smell anything even remotely like this. It isn't nutty or fruity, and definitely not mild. The smell is so bad I can't bring myself to taste it, let alone use it for anything. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: May NOT be Avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: Used this to oil a high quality clad stainless pan to cook pancakes. It completely glazed the pan at medium to low temperature. Ingredients listed claim avocado oil "100% Pure Oil" which is seems may not be all avocado oil. There are many bonafide high temp cooking oil products available elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska-Island

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: The oil does what it's supposed to, but it does have a stronger flavor than another brand I've used in the past from Chosen Foods. If you are okay with some avocado flavor to your scrambled eggs which is what I mostly use this for, then you're okay. Most other foods cover the flavor of this spray so it's not an issue. The spray bottle mechanism works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil but NOT FOR MAYO
customer_reviews.text: I buy avocado oil mainly for making mayo—my usual brand, Chosen Foods, was out, so I thought I’d give this one a try. It’s very delicious, but NOT for mayo, as the flavor is very saturated and strong (and color a nice rich green)—almost like very good, potent olive oil. I made mayo with it and it just tasted off. So, great oil but beware if you’re buying it for the same purpose as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to cooking oil.
customer_reviews.text: I watched a YouTube cook, Sam the cooking Guy. He uses for all sorts of dishes and has a high smoke point. Great flavor and easy to use. My only complaint is the canister. Spilled oil collects on top of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Toaster943

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil is great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different kinds of avocado oils, basically cheaper options. With the quarantine in place, I try to buy most of the stuff online and finally arrived the time when I decided to try this brand. I am so delighted, it tasted so good. I liked the texture, it also looks more natural than other brands I was using. I hope it is a quality, at least it seems like it. Highly recommend it. I am going to try out the sesame oil next.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing to condition hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!...Use it to sauté & fry...Very healthy! But mostly use it as conditioner for my hair....I am finding in recent years I cannot find a hair conditioner without it making my hair fall out...Too many additives in the conditioners. Avocado oil is my remedy...One teaspoon in palm of my hand & I run hands & fingers through my hair...Comb goes right through the hair, no fallout on the comb! Yes, it the hair looks oily, so don't do it if you have plans to go out. Do it at night. Wonderful conditioning moisturizer.... Washes out easily next day & no other conditioner is needed...Hair is still tangle free without being oily....Will not be without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon? Maybe...

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: love this product- although I only use it for food (not on my body.). maybe I should try it on my body one of these days tho. lol. It is my go-to for most recipes that require olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: mike higgins

customer_reviews.title: This brand puts others to shame!!
customer_reviews.text: Not all avocado oils are created equal this brand puts other brands to shame. By far this avocado oil is rich thick and very emollient & actual avocado oil. Just what I was looking for. I purchased this oil for hot oil treatments and also to cook with. The packaging is great too. I like the snap top and the artisan feel of the canister. Worth every penny. This company just became my go to for avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Only avocado oil I buy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my skin so luscious and buttery and my hair ultra glossy. I’ve tried many oils, some much more expensive but none of them nourish and moisturize my skin like unrefined avocado oil does. Avocado oil has been shown to have collagen-boosting properties, a must for healthy youthful skin! This brand is the best quality for the best price. Buy this instead of the inferior refined avocado oil from Now Foods!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I usually use another brand, but decided to try this because it was cheaper. The taste is not as good as the other product I usually buy, and I did not like the packaging at all. The pour spout leaks, so when you are finished pouring, it always runs down the side of the can. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jetskier

customer_reviews.title: Great oil damaged package
customer_reviews.text: This avocado oil is nice and light with a slightly nutty flavor. I would definitely purchase again. That being said, this item arrived damaged. It was shipped in a box with other oils and this is the only one that looked beat up. It was also the only one wrapped in bubble wrap. On the positive side, nothing leaked out and now, I guess it makes the container easier to hold with my little baby hands 👐
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Smell really bad.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying avocado oil from this brand almost a year.in couple of my order the oil started smelling really bad n the food in which I used this oil started smelling bad too.quality of this oil have gone down .
customer_reviews.author: Pretty in pink.

customer_reviews.title: This product is 100% Avocado oil. High smoke point.
customer_reviews.text: Avocado oil is a healthy replacement for corn, safflower, vegetable oils. There is no flavor interference. The smoke point is substantially high, like coconut oil, but without the flavor interference. It's around 500 degrees. This is not a blend, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Can arrived dented in thick bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to sear steak in my cast iron skillet. It gave it a lovely flavor, combined with the spices I used. I was afraid to use olive oil, because it burns at high temperatures, but this worked. There was still a lot of smoke, and the smoke detector went berserk...still worth it! I don't understand how the can got so dented. It must've been that way when they shipped it, because the bubble wrap was very dense,( and the box was in perfect condition). You couldn't damage the can through that if you tried. But it smelled and tasted ok, so I used it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A.

customer_reviews.title: Walmart brand tasted like motor oil
customer_reviews.text: I compared the flavor of this oil (about a dime -sized amount in the palm of my hand) to the "naturally refined" avocado oil by Better Body Foods which is a Walmart brand, the La tourangelle tasted both fruity and nutty, it tasted wonderful, by comparison, the Walmart brand tasted like motor oil.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Better than olive oil for cooking; good taste too!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for cooking (I read that it can withstand higher heat in cooking than olive oil). The taste is pleasing - even in salads - and the nutrients are those that are contained in a Haas avocado. I recently purchased some quality stainless steel pans (throwing my remaining Teflon coated pans in the garbage) and the advice contained with several of them is that it is best not to use spray cooking oil. I certainly prefer the taste of this avocado oil and will definitely order again. Should also mention that there are no issues with how the container opens with this product as I have read in reviews of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent avocado oil, but it can get messy when you pour it
customer_reviews.text: After a few pours you'll see what I mean, when you put the bottle down after pouring it gathers on the side rim so once enough has gathered, you may drip some on the stove or wherever once it reaches the "rim full" level. On second thought, I'm a heavy pourer so that may contribute to the mess too. Pretty design otherwise and the oil is good too. Price not amazing but ok for good quality avocado oil. Nice colour oil. Would buy again if the same size was available again on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: WojoTek

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil as a night time moisturizer for quite sometime now. I love this product so much. It absorbs so well into your skin and it is not at all greasy. My skin is so soft and has a natural glow when I wake up in the morning. I am very happy with this purchase, will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Nature

customer_reviews.title: Spout design is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but the bottle design is absolutely terrible! The spout leaks so when you pour it oil comes out from the sides of the bottle. I lose about 10% of the product this way because I have no choice but to whip all of the excess oil off!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: This is an undefined blend of avocado oils
customer_reviews.text: This is an oil made with presumably Mexican avocados but not from the Hass species that are the best, which are then pressed in California under a brand name of some French artisans. As per other user's reviews this is an oil made up of an undefined mixture of refined and unrefined oil. A refined oil is one that usually has been bleached or deodorized after its extraction. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: The can has a large dent not caused in transit.
customer_reviews.text: While the oil seems fine, with a yellow-green hue and no chemical taste or odor, the can arrived with a dent larger than a half dollar coin. The dent is not from shipping because it was delivered by an Amazon van and there was no damage to the box, and the can was wrapped in bubble wrap. A dented can of any food items should never be sold. For this reason I give it 1 star. The date is fine = July 2022.
customer_reviews.author: hmmm

customer_reviews.title: dented can
customer_reviews.text: The oil is great but the dents in the can are not! Poorly packed for shipping. Glad it didn't leak on everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: *****WARNING-may contain trace amount of PEANUTS, SESAME SEEDS, TREE NUTS*****
customer_reviews.text: My headline speaks for itself! Image shows you where it is on the rear label. They have the picture with the product but you might pass over that warning. People have nut allergies so this product would DEFINITELY be UNSUITABLE for those individuals whom have a sensitivity towards nuts. As for the taste: it is good but not as good as Greek Extra Virgin Olive Oil.... Hue: nice green color I pan fried with it and the Tilapia was perfect! I highly recommend this product except for people whom have a sensitivity towards trace amount of nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Real Pilot

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite avocado oil so far. I've been using for years and I tried many different types but this one is complete. I love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Yes please
customer_reviews.text: This avocado oil tastes and looks good. The consistency is smooth and versatile...may be used for cooking, salad dressing base or as a hair and eye moisturizer. Packaging looks European and sophisticated. I have it out on the shelf, always at the ready. Artisan and hand-crafted, non-GMO verified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A soothing moisturizing oil for me and my kid's skin. Its an amazing winter product for me. I warm it up and massage on hair, leave it for an hour. After bath, my dry hair is actually silky. I love the quality of oil and definitely will buy, when its over. Amazon did awesome packing.
customer_reviews.author: ༒Andy༒

customer_reviews.title: Quality is impotrant
customer_reviews.text: I am new to using avacado oil (seems my spell checker has never even heard of it!). I ordered this La Tourangelle brand because I am a fan of their sesame oil. I also bought a larger bargain bottle of avacado oil at a warehouse club to do a comparison. This La Tourangelle oil wins by miles. It has a beautiful color and flavor and the bargain oil was bland and wimpy looking in comparison. Delicious high quality oil!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in all my cooking. It’s is a healthy alternative to other cooking oils. Good for frying. it doesn’t take a lot but I don’t know about deep frying. I drizzle it over my food. Avacado oil can be used for salad dressing also. There’s no over powering or after taste. I even use a little to scramble eggs. It would be good if the container was larger but a little goes a long way if used sparingly. I will be ordering more on a regular basis. Good quality. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: great and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use mainly for lotions and such but with this much I will be trying cooking with it. So far it is great to use in lotions and I am very pleased with this. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wonderful stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES this stuff!! She has bought it for several years and nothing else will do. She SWEARS BY THIS OIL!!! She cannot say enough good things about this product. SO BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: A definite fan
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of avocado oil in that it has the highest smoking point. This oil has performed very well. We tried a Kirkand version for much less from Costco, but the smoking point seems closer to olive oils we’ve used and that oil is definitely thinner, so no value seen. Purchasing this thru subscribe and save for the % off makes better sense.
customer_reviews.author: JNM

customer_reviews.title: Great buttery taste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I stumbled on it at a grocery store near where I used to live a few years ago. When I moved I was delighted that Amazon carries it. I use it for pretty much every recipe that calls for oil. It has a lovely, buttery flavor that tastes great on its own in salad dressings and can handle heat pretty well for cooking. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyman67

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Avocado oil that I have ever tried. The color is spot on and the viscosity is perfect. It makes delicious mayo as well as DIY lotions and body butters. Does it get any better than this? Fried foods are crispy and delicious and you know you are getting all of the wonderful qualities of the Avocado. Do your body a big favor with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Please mention the sesame oil and peanut oil warning
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! This may contain some peanut and sesame oil. Both of which I’m allergic to. As well as tree nut oil. Unfortunately, I opened this product and used it in a skin and hair care routine recently, thankfully, amazon issued a refund, and I tossed it. It didn’t have a strong smell. Pretty much orderless. Be aware if it is still not mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Cleopatra

customer_reviews.title: Hair care product
customer_reviews.text: Used in my wife’s hair, fantastic product. Really gives a smooth silky hair feel. Must use properly. Used in conjunction with Aloe Vera extract. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, it sprays very easily, has a very high heat point. I only eat clean foods and cook a lot of veggies and protein on the stove. I can feel safe knowing that when I use this product I get a healthy amount of fat and no chemicals with it. I haven't been able to taste avocado which ia fine with me. I just ordered 3 more today.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional yummy avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: I used it frying eggs. Yummy. Dont need butter. Sauteed my cooked rice adding curry seasoning. Yummy again. O my gosh. I put on my skin my hair. The taste of this avacado oil tastes like an avacado and green. Oh and sauteed my asparagus. Better than olive oil. Bought at a local store and paid twice the price. Cant wait to try La Tourangelles other oils. I'm amazed. Packaging in thick bubble wrapped tight. Great service. Thanks 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Great oil and cute packaging, but the container's a mess
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's organic and does whatever I need it to do. My only concern is the bottle itself. The way it's designed, it can get messy. It's not easy to control how much comes out. Then when I do get it under control, the metal rim catches my precious oil. I like everything else, but the container itself is a no no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy!

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil paired with rosemary essential oil for my hair. Love the natural, healthy way this nourishes my hair. In my 70s with dry hair this helps moisturize my hair with natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't affect the flavor or make foods taste oily
customer_reviews.text: Is this the best oil spray ever? I have no idea. I use it when making waffles and it works every time without affecting the flavor of the waffles or making them taste oily. I would prefer if it was organic, but that's a minor difference. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Svenson

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased to finally find avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: With all of my food sensitivities and dietary restrictions, I was pleased to finally find avocado oil. This has a much lighter taste and feel than olive oil (to which I found I was allergic, both ingested and topically). I use it successfully for anything for which I would use any other oil. I don't use a lot of oil, so this can lasts me several months without going rancid which is more than I can say for some other oils I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Avocado???
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this oil. Sadly, it's a disappointment. The scent is off and the taste is even worse. It does not smell or taste at all like avocado oil. I guess you get what you pay for. I won't be buying this ever again, it's better to pay a little more for a quality product that is actually real avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: Vasara Kat.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came in a can. I watched a video on YouTube about avocado oil for the skin and this stuff makes you skin pretty soft after it soaks in. I find that it actually does better to apply this to a damp face then pat it dry vs. on dry skin alone. Takes a few minutes to soak in but after that it doesn’t feel oily or greasy , just soft feeling skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. hill

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous productt!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this Avocado Oil! I use avocado oil instead of olive oil because it always has a lovely delicate taste. It's benefits are just as good but the taste is so much better. La Tourangelle brand is wonderful and the best price of any good avocado oil I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: The only way I can take an avacado!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I can get the health benefits of an avacado as I detest them. This oil takes good! I put mine in a smoothie and cannot taste it in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: I used to buy this is bulk, but took a chance here.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! The bottle was bigger than I thought it was going to be. Its nice and light in color and soaks in fast. I havent eaten it, as I bought it for my skin. I have bought this brand before, but the pumpkin seed, and I was happy with that too. This product is a great price for the amazing quality. I will absolutely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil..high burn rate stop using EVO if you need to use on a med/high heat..it becomes a carcinogen..Avacado oil is a must and this one is in a great looking non toxic can and tastes wonderful...only downfall..careful when you pour it..wide spout a ton came out until I got used to it..will be purchasing the larger one when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: CAZN

customer_reviews.title: Will def buy again. Love it for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to mix as a carrier with Neem oil per a recommendation from a ferrier for our donkeys. The avocado oil is great for cooking too. And I use it as a lotion after the bath. “Softest” oil. Like it better than coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Elle's Belles

customer_reviews.title: This oil is great for multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for multiple uses! I use in my hair for a hot oil treatment and it made my hair super soft without leaving a heavy residue. My curls were super soft, bouncy and had great shine I have used it for cooking as well. It wasn't over powering in any recipes and seems to be good replacement for Olive oil for dressings. I find Olive oil cans be a little overpowering and heavy. This avocado oil was the total opposite. Very light and a very light avocado taste that did not mess with the taste of any of my recipes! Will definitely purchase this brand again and make it a staple for my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: anewmeNOW

customer_reviews.title: Love this Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this Avocado Oil for years and it’s stil my favorite! I use in my body butter, my massage lotion, I remove my make up with it, I use it in my cold process soaps... even my whipped cold process! Such great moisturizing oil!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use love it!! Flavor is smooth and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. PL

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil time
customer_reviews.text: Started using this oil over olive oil and really like its ability to tolerate more heat than OO. Glad I tried it. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor; store in fridge
customer_reviews.text: I love using this oil in salads and recipes that include avocados. It really intensifies the flavor. I'd recommend keeping the oil in the refrigerator. My first tin started to get rancid when kept at room temperature. Unfortunately, the chilled oil is too thick to use, so you have to take it out about 1/2 hour before using. If it were in a glass bottle,it would be much easier to warm to room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: Expenssive but good
customer_reviews.text: on the expensive side. I luve in Nebraska and bought a quart of avacado oil for less.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: that's what this oil tastes like - old stale guacamole
customer_reviews.text: Tastes rancid already.....you know that soapy, off flavor that old, dark guacamole has at the local "Mexican" place? Yeah, that's what this oil tastes like - old stale guacamole. Unpalatable. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JLBM

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY OIL
customer_reviews.text: Over all I like this oil. I have not gotten used to the taste yet when using it on a salad but is okay in cooking. I am actually using it more on my skin and it is very moisturizing. Cannot go wrong considering the good price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: My preferred cooking oil!
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil to cook a lot! It is light and dosent leave a taste behind on your foods (ex. pan fried egg ). I use it to make stirfry veggies it is Super healthy, great alternative to olive oil, remember a little goes a long way. I also use a few drops on my hair in combo with my hair deep conditioner...it is that good!
customer_reviews.author: ladyL

customer_reviews.title: Wish the bottle design could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for cooking my kids' food. The tast is OK. Everytime I just used it a little. But when pouring, the liquid often gets caught in the lip of the bottle. It's kind of waste. If it could be in a spray bottle, that will be great. Just wish the bottle design could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!  Size is smaller but almost same price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the past but only paid approximately $10.00 for a 16.9 ounce can but this last time I was in a hurry and somehow selected the 8.45 ounce can for almost $9.00. So I got half the amount for only one dollar less. It pays to NOT be in a hurry and check quantity of product!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great product in a leaky container
customer_reviews.text: The oil is great! The container - not so much. It leaks from the cap every time I pour it.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to taste just like biting into an avocado
customer_reviews.text: A very light oil with a very light flavor. Don't expect it to taste just like biting into an avocado, but it does have a hint of the flavor. I use it to sprinkle over greens and pasta for an easy way to get some of those healthy fats in my diet. Also, do not put in fridge. I tried this (thinking it would preserve it) and it started to solidify.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I am only using coconut oil and avacado oil in my cooking these days, My family doesn't care for virgin coconut oil but they don't complain about this avacado oil. I prefer the green oils to the clear ones. This one is green and at the top of my list for avacado oils.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Light Oil, easy to use, I use on pans, directly on veggies or other foods, great taste, helps to prevent sticking, lasts a long time. I’m hooked! Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for natural curly AA hair!
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOOOVE this oil. This is the first oil that actually moisturizes my hair. I have course curly natural 4b/c hair. This oil gives just the right amount of moisture and shine. Everyone raves about coconut oil which I've used on my hair for 1 year now without great results, avocado oil far exceeded the results I got from coconut oil. I use it on my body too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Martin

customer_reviews.title: Can cannot be opened
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product quickly. However, upon removing the bubble wrap, i discovered the can can not be opened. Included is a photo of how I recieved the product. Cannot be used since it cannot be opened. I’d appreciate customer assistance as soon as possible. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I heard about it and it was on a recipe I wanted to try. However I cooked with it and I have a problem with how it tasted. I have never used it again. Since it was the first time I was exposed to it, I could not tell you if it arrived fresh or not.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Who needs olive oil when you can have this?
customer_reviews.text: I just used my last little drop. It has very little “avocado” taste which makes it really versatile. It works well in low or high heat. Personally, I think it’s better than olive oil for daily cooking. As a side note, I have used it on my face and it does moisture well and doesn’t feel greasy. Great product! Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff mikels

customer_reviews.title: Best High Heat Vegetable Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff in place of olive oil in almost every cooking situation. The smoke point for this oil (520 degrees F) is much higher than olive oil (extra virgin 320 degrees F), so I can hard sear some steak and not have to worry about the oil burning. I preheat my black iron pot to 500 degrees in the oven for an hour and than I stick it on my electric coil burner on high and pour a tablespoon or so in the pan. I then drop the steaks in. I have a friend who broils his steaks in the oven, so it would be good for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Very good quality. Rich. Thick. Not over powering. In the stores this brand sells for twice as much. Bought another "big lot" store brand. The difference in quality was strongly evident. You go cheap, you get cheap.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch but not the quality I would expect...
customer_reviews.text: I like Avocado Oil. I think this oil is pretty good but it's not great. It seems to start to change flavor rather quickly after opening. It's as if it's not fresh from the start. Perhaps it takes a beating in shipping. I have taken to keeping it in the fridge (instead of our cool pantry) to arrest the level of freshness. I was glad when our local Costco started carrying a large glass bottle of it for a reasonable price. I would purchase this in a pinch but it is not my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ciganka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality avacado oil. Works great for diy recipeas. I keep in the refrigerator. The only problem is it won’t pour out the spout it wants to run down the bottom of the can. It still is great quality avacado oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for skin and hair care
customer_reviews.text: This oil when used on wet hair does wonders!! Keeps it from drying out for days in any weather. It's also great on skin but I wouldn't recommend it for the face.
customer_reviews.author: AliCat

customer_reviews.title: Great but typo
customer_reviews.text: I love all of their products I have tried. Great for cooking different dishes. Only problem is, there is a typo on the packaging, "...you dishes."
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with avocado oil! I just started recently and so far I am loving it. This oil is good quality and the taste is good but mild! While the design of the bottle is visually appealing, it lacks in functionality. The oil doesn't pour out evenly and it ends up dripping from the spout and collecting in the rim of the can. Other than that I enjoyed using this oil.
customer_reviews.author: goldenbear

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: Very good for hair. It makes the hair soft. My hair length was the same for a very long time, after I started using this oil regularly I can see difference in the length, finally an answer for hair issues.
customer_reviews.author: Renu

customer_reviews.title: GENUINE
customer_reviews.text: First thing a foodie does, sniff and taste. It gets an A+ for both.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love trying different kinds of "healthy" cooking oils (or oils one can use on salads and veggies. This is great! Just wish they had a larger amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for this oil, I use it for cooking. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: texas

customer_reviews.title: I like using this for removing makeup and sunscreen before I ...
customer_reviews.text: A+ This magic oil has so many uses for me. I have sensitive skin and this has been a game changer. I like using this for removing makeup and sunscreen before I tone. Great for shaving with. I also add a few drops to my conditioner and hair products. Ha! I haven't tried cooking with it yet. I guess I will keep one in the bathroom and one in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: MyaBird29

customer_reviews.title: might be great for cooking but not for skin
customer_reviews.text: might be great for cooking but not for skin. it's a mess to try and put on and you have to clean up after you put on. plus it seems to be bad for face vs. coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: A boz

customer_reviews.title: nice oil I bought it as a moisturizer so I ...
customer_reviews.text: nice oil I bought it as a moisturizer so I never tried to cook with it but it makes my hair look like glass with just a drop
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: the spout is not great but the oil is
customer_reviews.text: The -1 star is far the fact that the design of the spout creates a little bit of backsplash that makes some of the oil run down the side after every use (which is hella annoying). Other than that, the oil itself is good quality. We put ours in a squeeze bottle so there's less oil on our counter and to get more of the 16.9 oz. in the pan!
customer_reviews.author: Tamiko T

customer_reviews.title: Very light flavor and pleasant aroma a nice addition to salad and stir fry
customer_reviews.text: Very light flavor and pleasant aroma a nice addition to salad, as with all oils a little goes a long way. Edited: I am also now using this oil to saute veggies as it has a high smoke point. I have upped my review to 5 stars to reflect the benefit of using this oil in place of other cooking oils. I do not deep fry anything at this time. I have purchased the larger size of this same brand also on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in the bath!
customer_reviews.text: I'd read many places about the benefits of avocado oil for the skin, particularly for psoriasis suffers like me. After looking at several brands, I decided to go with this one -- I cook with their grapeseed and sesame oils all the time, so I know they're high quality. Sure enough, this is a lovely, green oil that is super moisturizing. I absolutely love how my skin feels after adding 2 tablespoons of this to my garden tub and soaking for an hour. Some day, I might even try cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bea Haven

customer_reviews.title: I must say it taste better than Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have never used avocado oil before. I have always used olive oil. But once I received it and tasted it, I must say it taste better than Olive Oil. And I'm very picky when it comes to the quality of olive oil. If I cannot eat the olive oil on bread I will not use it. The avocado oil taste better on bread and even tastes better than butter.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Could be easier to spray
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the button to spray is in the front of the trigger and confusing when using the first handful of times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high temperature searing cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on Avocado Oil. Searing meats such as Filet Mignon medallions on very high heat works extremely well because this oil does not burn easily as olive oil would. The taste is similar to olive oil without the bitterness so I can use it in salads as well. I would have wished they offer this oil in larger containers so I could replace it with olive oil altogether. I will try and see if I can find a source locally where I live
customer_reviews.author: SnugglesTheHusky

customer_reviews.title: solidifies in fridge
customer_reviews.text: It solidifies in the refrigerator. Must be kept at room temperature. I don't use oil enough to keep it at room temperature all the time. It needs to stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy.

customer_reviews.title: Just received my order but to have flavored Extra Virgin Olive Oil, simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: As I seek healthier eating these days....but to be able to use this on for moisturizing richness to skin and hair as a 2nd option...I am sold! Just received my order and haven't cooked with it yet... but who can go wrong with extra virgin olive oil right?
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

product_meta.title: La Tourangelle, Avocado Oil, 16.9 fl oz
product_meta.description: Size:16.9 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Style:Avocado OilLa Tourangelle Avocado Oil is 100% pure, all-natural and handcrafted from premium avocados. Avocado oil is processed on equipment very similar to those used to process extra virgin olive oil. The avocado pulp is first expeller-pressed usually using a centrifuge. It is then lightly filtered and "polished" using another centrifuge. It takes from 15–20 avocados to make 1 (one) 250 ml/8 ounce tin. The result is a beautiful, emerald green oil with high level of monounsaturated fats that will bring a delicious, light fruity flavor to your dishes. La Tourangelle Avocado Oil, like La Tourangelle Olive and Hazelnut oil, contains oleic acid, a monounsaturated fat that may help to lower cholesterol. In one study of people with moderately high cholesterol levels, individuals who ate a diet high in avocados showed clear health improvements. After a few days on the diet that included avocados, they had significant decreases in total cholesterol and LDL cholesterol, along with an increase in health promoting HDL cholesterol. The purity of La Tourangelle Avocado Oil makes it also an ideal partner to moisturizing your skin and hair. The skin absorbs it quickly without leaving residues. It has a light weight that’s easily absorbed into the hair and scalp to moisturize. La Tourangelle is one of few remaining oil mills keeping a time-honored French heritage of roasting and pressing nut kernels into delicious oils. We are a family-owned company whose mastery of oil production is the fruit of passion, integrity, and pride. We strive to be the best artisan oil producer, dedicated to making carefully crafted, sustainable, natural products. With artisan care, we extract the seeds' essence and hidden natural treasures to create amazing products that bring delight in the kitchen and well being for the body.
feature_bullets: QUALITY YOU CAN TASTE: La Tourangelle brings artisan excellence to your kitchen and home. The mainstay of all La Tourangelle’s natural, artisanal oils is premium taste derived from the best quality ingredients. Add the flavor of La Tourangelle to any meal.

FOR FOOD & BEYOND: 100% pure, all-natural and handcrafted from premium avocados, this emerald green oil is wonderful in salad dressings, on fresh cut fruit or grilled fish. It's also great for skin and hair; for soft skin, just apply it after a shower.

DELICIOUS & VERSATILE: La Tourangelle oils make it easy to create distinctive dishes for professional chefs, novice cooks and foodies alike. Great for salads, on grilled meat, pasta, or a cheese plate, our oils create memorable moments around the table.

NATURAL & SUSTAINABLE: La Tourangelle's delicious, artisan oils provide the perfect touch to make a gourmet breakfast, lunch, or dinner. We strive to be the best artisan oil producer, dedicated to making carefully crafted, sustainable, natural products.

KITCHEN? YOU MEAN ART STUDIO: From Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil to our AvoCoco butter substitute & Pesto Oil, La Tourangelle brings the best oils and flavors from around the world straight to your kitchen. Discover your culinary creativity with our oils!
